description: '''X Marks the Pedwalk''' (sometimes written as X-Marks the Pedwalk) is a German [[Band (rock and pop)|band]] whose [[Music genre|styles]] range from [[post-industrial (music)|post-industrial]] dance to electronic body music. X Marks the Pedwalkâ€™s influence in the industrial and electronic music [[Subculture|scenes]] was considerable during the 1990s, as they were one of the first and most popular acts from the now defunct [[record label]], [[Zoth Ommog]].
